title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: January 05, 2023, 04:23:58 PMLast edit: January 24, 2023, 01:03:23 AM by minerjones
content: From maker MrMojoRising26 comes his latest offering:MyBits .999 silver/gilt 1oz 2022 coinsEach coin comes as a funded version or buyer funded version and comes with a display box and COABonus feature: coins are numbered on the rim.. added new picture belowThe holograms are marked accordingly and can be seen belowKeys were produced by MoparMiningLLCThere were a total of 100 coins minted, but some were damaged, making only 88 availableOf those 88, 44 are the funded version and the other 44 are the buyer-funded versionThe damaged coins are not currently available, but there may be plans in the future from the maker for these to be releasedDamaged funded numbers: 14,15,18,20,23,28,39Damaged buyer-funded coins: 46,48,51,54,75Some coins were pre-sold by the maker, so not all numbers will be available.Here are what is available:BUYER FUNDED: 56,58,59,61,62,63,64,65,67,68,71,72,73,74,87,88,89,90,91,97,98**Funded coins will require funding before being shipped out.PRICE PER COIN: $150 plus load (when applicable)SHIPPING: based on location and preferenceGRADING: available for an additional feeFUNDEDBUYER FUNDED

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: Would love 2 Funded and 2 Buyer Funded.Prefer numbers 57 and 69 if available to match my 1st edition, happy to have any other numbers if no longer available. Geo

comments.body: Based on my experience with the silver-plated coins which look amazing I think I'll love these real-silver ones even more.Can recommend to anyone looking for a classic yet affordable design.
